page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT
page.content: The major employer is the NCB at Rufford Colliery.There are 1420 surface & underground miners with 25 & 38 management & clerical positions.The other primary industry is Ratcher Sand Quarry owned by Mansfield Standard Sand & employing 30 people.Two small modern industrial estates situated along the A617 between Rainworth & Mansfield provide approximately 700 jobs, 370 of which are provided by the soft drinks manufacturer Mandora which is part of Mansfield Brewery. Other firms are Trebor Group Distributon,Securicor,DCS carpets & British Woodwares.This pattern will probably remain unchanged if coal supplies at the present rate of extraction.
